title: Ticket #4095: condor_who -daemons doesn't not properly detect master is alive
description: In pointing condor_who -daemon -log xxxxxxxxx to a possible running personal condor all the daemons but the master are reported up. The master was in fact up. I save a log on ingwe. /scratch/bt/MasterLog.CWbad
remarks:
2014-Feb-05 15:14:46 by tim:
Is this still a problem? At today's FW meeting there was speculation that this was no longer an issue.
